      @GetMapping("/login") public String showLoginForm(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @RequestParam(name="error",required=false) String error)

      Parameters:

    • login

      @PostMapping("/login") public String login(@RequestParam String username, @RequestParam String password, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles login attempts.
      Parameters:
      username - the username provided
      password - the password provided
      model - the model to be used
      Returns:
      redirect to the news page if successful, or back to the login page with error if unsuccessful

    • logout

      @GetMapping("/logout") public String logout(org.springframework.web.bind.support.SessionStatus status)
      Handles user logout.
      Parameters:
      status - the session status to be completed
      Returns:
      redirect to the login page
